Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Sylvia Mendlow Papers
Mendlow, Sylvia
Mendlow, Sylvia
WAG.035
3 Linear Feet (3 boxes)
1964-1975 Materials are in English 1 2
Historical/Biographical Note
Sylvia Mendlow was a co-chairman of the United Federation of Teachers (UFT) Library Committee in New York City in the late 1960s.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Sylvia Mendlow was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Scope and Contents
The collection includes correspondence, conference material, educational pamphlets, photographs, and newspaper clippings dating from the mid-1960s to the mid-1970s. The papers document the UFT's organization of librarians, as well as efforts to improve school library standards.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Sylvia Mendlow Papers; WAG 035; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Sylvia Mendlow in 1982. The accession number associated with this gift is 1950.040.
